mapper.select: SELECT p.`pmsName` AS permission_name, p.`pmsDescribe` AS permission_description, u.`username`,u.`status`,u.`email` FROM permission p INNER JOIN rolepms rp ON p.`id` = rp.`pmsID` INNER JOIN role r ON r.id = rp.`roleID` INNER JOIN userrole ur ON r.id = ur.`roleID` INNER JOIN USER u ON u.`id` = ur.`userID` WHERE u.`id` = #{id};
SELECT u.id, u.`username`, u.`password`, u.`status`, u.`email`, u.`type`, r.id,r.`name`,r.`description` FROM user u LEFT JOIN userrole ur ON u.id = ur.userID LEFT JOIN role r ON ur.roleID = r.id;
